physical_appearance:This is a beaded purse. It is adorned with an embroidery of patterned sequins and beads
 against a background of maroon velvet. On the flap of the purse
 there is a depiction of a dragon\u0027s head in the center. The rest of the purse is decorated with floral motifs.
subject_terms_1:beadwork (visual works) plant-derived motifs dragons purses (ladies\u0027 accessories)
subject_terms_2:Beadwork Motifs Pouches (Containers) Dragons Handbags
subject_terms_3:Decorative arts
sgcool_label_text:This purse is embroidered with a figure of a dragon on one side and a phoenix on the other. As shown on this piece
 the phoenix is a combination of the neck of a crane
 feathers of a golden pheasant and tail of a peacock
 which is effectively depicted here with both metal and glass seed beads. It was a symbol of honour and riches. It was said to appear only in times of peace.

metadata.title_text: Beaded Pouch with Dragon and Phoenix Designs
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a beaded purse. It is adorned with an embroidery of patterned sequins and beads, against a background of maroon velvet. On the flap of the purse, there is a depiction of a dragon's head in the center. The rest of the purse is decorated with floral motifs.
metadata.subject_terms_1: beadwork (visual works) plant-derived motifs dragons purses (ladies' accessories)
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This purse is embroidered with a figure of a dragon on one side and a phoenix on the other. As shown on this piece, the phoenix is a combination of the neck of a crane, feathers of a golden pheasant and tail of a peacock, which is effectively depicted here with both metal and glass seed beads. It was a symbol of honour and riches. It was said to appear only in times of peace.
